data.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms / 三國志
data.detailed_description:
To commemorate Kou Shibusawa's 35th anniversary, the "Kou Shibusawa Archives" will be opened in the Steam Store. Here we will revive popular previously released titles. Among the first released will be Romance of the Three Kingdoms which was first released in 1985.
Romance of the Three Kingdoms was the first Japanese game to be based on the Chinese classic "Romance of the Three Kingdoms." Players become the leaders of their countries and strive to unite the land under their rule.


【Regarding Online User Registration】

Online User Registration is a system for users to receive services through inputting their unique game serial number at the dedicated KOEI TECMO GAMES portal site, GAMECITY. Registration is free. Please register your game.
For your convenience, Users' browsers can access the proper site through the Online User Registration menu in the Launcher.

【Regarding the survey】

For taking the time to fill out our survey, users will receive a GC Coin, usable at the KOEI TECMO GAMES portal site, GAMECITY. Please see the Survey menu in the Launcher.

data.short_description: Romance of the Three Kingdoms was first released in 1985. It was the first Japanese game to be based on the Chinese classic "Romance of the Three Kingdoms." Players become the leaders of their countries and strive to unite the land under their rule.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only)
  • Processor: 1GHz over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 800x600 pixel over
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 22KHz/16bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. only)
  • Processor: 1GHz over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 800x600 pixel over
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 22KHz/16bit
